name: After Death (itch) (191brian)
description:
You are near to death so volunteer to take part in a near death experiment  after you die you must guide your ghost the reveal the cards hidden on the shelfs above your bed. Use your arrow keys to move left right & down.

The tic file is a TIC-80 cart containing the source & graphic assets to open it you will need TIC-80 which is available for multiple platforms either from their website tic80.com or on itch tic 80 on itch.io
